intro: Jump higher, aim sharper, and score like a pro!
description:
Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball challenges you to jump, aim, and score in spectacular style! Take control on the trampoline and enjoy a game full of energy, color, and fun. With simple and engaging gameplay, every shot becomes a new challenge. Improve your personal score or compete with friends to prove you’re the king of flying hoops.

Key Features:
 • Intuitive gameplay – simple controls, perfect for all players
 • Dynamic trampolines – jump higher, shoot farther
 • Leaderboards & scores – climb to the top and earn bragging rights
 • Unlimited playtime – play anytime, anywhere, stress-free

Get ready for epic jumps and unforgettable shots – it’s showtime in Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball!
